Tobit * or Tobias *__06.8__Its heart: : The liver (ver. 19) God was pleased to give these things a virtue against those proud spirits, to make them, who affected to be like the Most High, subject to such mean corporeal creatures as instruments of his power.
Tobit * or Tobias *__06.15__Hell: : That is, to the place where the souls of the good were kept before the coming of Christ.
